title: Place of business and posting of license
context: §444-14 Place of business and posting of license. (a) A licensed contractor shall have, maintain, and operate from a definite place of business in the State and shall display therein his or her contractor&rsquo;s license. (b) The licensed contractor shall report any change of address or telephone number to the contractors license board within ten business days from such change. [L 1957, c 305, §1(s 13); Supp, §166A-13; HRS §444-14; am L 1975, c 129, §1]
